relation: Great for these types of students
Work hard and do not procrastinate.
Richland College is the start of my future. It is the place that will open many doors for me. This college will help me build my career.
pageTitle: Richland College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {29224=a great college. i attended richland college directly out of high school in 1985, got sidetrack with marriage and starting a family, and now i am back. it is still the great professional college it was in 1985., 10096=The prices here are amazing, and I was so amazed that the fall ( I had 13 hours) and spring (I had 14 hours) totaled to less than $2200, required supplies included! Compared to the 20-30 thousand my friends are paying at major universities to take the same classes, for now, I feel like I stole my education so far. Trust me you'll love the prices., 312590=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 303926=I'm graduating in May with around 70 credits, so I've taken quite a few classes. I don't think the classes are hard at all. Some of the science classes I have taken were difficult, but really, it depends on your professor and your willingness to study. There are multiple places on campus for tutoring which is really nice, and the tutors are extremely helpful. Almost all of the professors I have had have been amazing. I know that Richland has won some type of award that no other 2-year college in America has won (the faculty doesn't let us forget), so that is a good sign! It's a good school., 264794=As of now, I have not heard of any criminal activities on the campus and I have been attending this school since 2011. I feel very safe there.}

textAfterTable: Cody from Dallas, TX 12/11/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 78 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Any student who wants to take their core classes, students who just do not know what university they want to attend, or anyone that just wants to get a good education at an affordable price. Tips for prospective students Register early! During Richland's enrollment the campus gets packed with students new and old. Try and register for classes online but its always good to visit the Richland's advising office for any questions. Bang for the buck Classes are cheap, and there are financial aid offices always willing to help. Am enjoying being here The Richland Student community is very helpful and there are many clubs and societies anyone can join or start your own. The college is very diverse and anyone can fit in really well.
